backend/main.mo: Implements access-controlled user profiles and booking request storage, with admin-only queries for viewing all bookings.
feature_evidence.json: Records feature verification metadata for adding a Google Search Console meta tag to frontend/index.html.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short summaries for all frontend files describing styling, components, hooks, and configuration.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Provides step-by-step deployment instructions and smoke tests for verifying the frontend and backend.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global frontend styles.
frontend/index.html: Static HTML entrypoint including Google site verification, metadata, and script loader for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Controls simple view switching between the marketing page and admin requests page.
frontend/src/components/BookingForm.tsx: Implements a full booking request form with validation, submission logic, and success feedback.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Displays address, phone, email, and hours using business contact constants.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Internet Identity login/logout button handling authentication states and retry logic.
Renders four service cards showcasing travel-related offerings with icons.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, quick links, and contact info using constants for email and phone.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Implements a responsive header with logo, navigation, admin button, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/constants/contact.ts: Exports email and phone contact constants used across the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminBookingReques: Fetches all booking requests for admin users using the actor and role checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identities, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a query to fetch the caller's user role via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitBookingReque: Mutation hook to submit booking requests and invalidate admin requests cache.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles and custom CSS variables for the site's color theme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminRequestsPage.tsx: Admin page that checks identity and role, displays booking requests, and handles access states.
frontend/src/pages/MarketingPage.tsx: Renders the main marketing page with hero, services, booking, and contact sections, using smooth scrolling and shared layout components.
frontend/src/utils/assetUrl.ts: Provides helpers for generating correct static and generated asset URLs based on environment.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks overall project metadata, features, and state including a pending Google Search Console verification tag request.
